posts.postText:
Hello everyone!
Just some quick updates!
Congratulations to Pharaoh for being our 100th member on the forums!
[NNJG] Now has 8 servers! 6 GMOD, A TF2, AND A CS:S!
_Crisis is no longer mod, and Rain is no longer admin. We're sorry to see them go.
The [NNJG]Bans page is no longer being updated, so disregard anything there.
The deathrun server has been made into a test, and jail into a VIP server. (secret)
GMStranded is still broken, but will hopefully be up again soon!

Thanks!!
~[NNJG]Ben/Maniac Man~
